title: PH60203: Optical Fiber Technology - Quick Facts

Course name | Optical Fiber Technology
Offered by | Physics

Previous Year Grade Distribution

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Introduction to optical fibers. Applications in communications, medicine, and sensors. Methods of manufacturing optical fibers and cables. Characterization of fibers and cables. Optical communication systems, associated accessories. Special fibers, fiber amplifiers and lasers.
